1.content: Which girls do you want to see?
1.title: Where?

11.content:
You woke up in a strange building. You didn’t know where you were. You panicked! Then you suddenly heard static from inside one of your pant pockets. You dug inside to find a tape. It looks like someone left you a recorded message! You pressed play and you heard someone’s voice. It was a voice you never heard before. “Greetings player. Welcome to the game. Never mind who I am. You just need to listen to my instructions. You were picked randomly to t participate in this game, and yes you were brought here by force. And there’s no escape for you here. You can only escape if you win the game.” This was all crazy to you!

“Now what exactly is this game you ask? Well here are the rules. A whole bunch of girls with top notch quirks are going to search around the building to find you. If one finds you, they get to keep you all for themselves and your body will be under their control. You will obey every command they give you. You don’t want that to happen. So your job is to run and hide from these girls for a whole hour. If you succeed then you win and you’ll get to leave. But like I said before, if they catch you, you lose and will be that person’s slave forever. That pretty much explains the game. Good luck.”

You were shocked, surprised, terrified! This game was total madness! If you lose you will be a slave forever! “The game starts at 3:00 pm.” The recording ended. You checked the clock. It was exactly 3:00 pm! You heard girl voices echo through the halls! With blind panic you ran and hide somewhere! You sat down breathing heavily! 5 minutes has passed. No one has found you. You felt confident until your confidence faded when you felt someone touch you!

It was...
11.title: The main academia girls.

choices: Clean my feet with your tongue!
111.content:
Suddenly, you felt your sense of balance disappear and within seconds, you were floating in mid-air.

"Oh my gosh, I did it!" You were caught! An announcement played over the building intercoms, "Attention contestants. The game is now over. Ochacho Uraraka has won the game. She will get a special room to test her new slave while the rest of you will leave with nothing. That is all." The announcement ended.

This was terrifying. You were a slave to this girl now! She had pale skin and shoulder-length brown hair. You also noticed that she was wearing a pink and navy blue full-body suit, which included pink wide knee-high boots. Judging by your initial interaction with her, you could probably guess that her personality seemed to be one of happiness and determination.

"I can’t believe I won myself a new slave!" you heard Uraraka shout out in joy. She tapped you on your back, which made gravity return to you as well as the ground. "Sorry about that but I really needed to catch you. Now follow me! I know where the special room is!"

You didn't really want to follow her, but her voice was somehow irresistible to you. Besides, she seemed like a nice person. Reluctantly, you decided to just follow her to the special dorm. Eventually, the both of you arrived at the room and from the moment of arrival, you watched as Uraraka ran towards the queen-sized bed and launched herself into the blankets.

On the other hand, as Uraraka was busy admiring how comfortable the bed was, you noticed that at the end of the bed, there was a compartment that looked like some sort of torture device. You shuddered, realizing that you were probably going to be put there to endure her feet. Before any nastier thoughts came into fruition, Uraraka’s interrupted you, now wearing a devious smile on her face.

"Alright slave! I've been sweating so hard in these boots from running around trying to catch you so as your master, I want you to..."
111.title: Ochacho Uraraka

choices: Continue making out with her foot.
Wait, that wasn't part of the agreement! Another girl walks into the room!
11132.content:
"If you like them so much why you don't kiss them?" Uraraka suggests, giggling a little at her statement, "Actually, don't start yet. I have a great idea for this!"

The brown-haired teenager taps herself on the chest, and floats upwards, as if the weight of her body vanished away. Once she is completely airborne, she tries to 'swim' towards you, but fails to gain any momentum.

"Aw, that sucks!" you hear her exclaim, "Oh well, come over here and kiss my feet!"

You felt an overwhelming urge to walk towards where she is floating aimlessly and pull her closer to you. Thanks to her quirk, the task was easy but before you could react, your face was forcibly pressed at the centre of her sole after the initial pull. Still, you're not just going to swallow your pride and do exactly what she says, right?

It's too bad your body disagreed with your mind. Bracing for the worst, you involuntarily pucker up your lips and started giving her feet small quick kisses, making sure that you spent as little contact with her foot as possible. Unfortunately, a full minute didn't pass until Uraraka whines, presumably because you aren't doing a very good job at it.

"You're going too fast!" Uraraka complains in a higher voice than usual. You glance sideways to see her expression; it is one of slight annoyance, "Slow down and take your time with each kiss!"

After hearing this, you feel your body involuntarily stiffen and in response, your mouth having some extra weight to it. It was like your perception of time was slowed down. You realise that you were forced to start kissing with a more passionate attitude, making the whole experience more embarrassing for you. You could smell the sour and taste a little bit of her salty foot sweat as you continue this task. You kiss her feet for half an hour, occasionally changing feet during that time, until she breaks the silence.

"Do you love them? They're so nice aren't they? In fact, they're so nice that you could almost marry them!" Uraraka taunts, laughing a little. You couldn't do anything else but kiss her feet. Uraraka crosses her arms and smirks, thinking of another way to torment you, "Ask my feet out on a date."

You didn't want to but you really had no choice. You remove her sole from your mouth and take a few steps back. With your most convincing voice, you say the most humiliating sentence you said in your life to the two most vile objects in the room, "W-will you both go out with me?"

Waiting for a response, you stare at her soles for a few seconds before you see the two feet 'nod' up and down. Well then, you're going out with two sweaty feet.

"That makes it official!" Uraraka teases, "Now don't be rude! Give one of my feet a big long kiss!"

You obey with a sad face as you pucker up and give the longest kiss of your life. It lasted for a minute before you regained some control of your body. However, it was almost impossible to take them off because again thanks to her sticky sweat your lips were attached to her sticky sole.

"Awww, I got these lovebirds together!"

You groaned.
11132.title: "Kiss my feet!"

112.content:
Suddenly you felt your body being wrapped around in something! You were then instantly pulled away from your spot and taken to a girl who was climbing on a wall. “Ribbit.” An announcement began to play. It meant you were caught! “Attention contestants! The game is now over! Tsuyu Asui, with the frog quirk, has won! The rest of you can now leave and Tsuyu gets to have her prize, plus a special room to test her new prize! Goodbye!” The announcement ended.

This can’t be happening! You were a slave to this girl now! She had long dark green hair that was tied together and her face looked weird. She wore a green and black body suit with yellow stripes. Her boots resembled frog feet and she wore goggles on her head. Her personality was straight forward and honest. The announcer said frog quirk. Frog quirk? You realized that you were wrapped around in her long frog-like tongue! Tsuyu then released you and jumped off the wall. “That wasn’t a very good hiding spot. You were easy to catch, ribbit.” For some reason that made you sad. “Your my slave now, so let’s go and test you in the special room. Follow me.” You followed her as she instructed. Your body was hers to control now!

You arrived in the special which appeared to be a high class bedroom. “Ribbit, it looks nice here. I like it.” Not much enthusiasm. Tsuyu then hopped onto the bed like a frog. “So what should I test you on?” She put her finger on her chin. Her hands were big! “Well my feet have been pretty sore, especially from jumping and climbing around everywhere. So here’s what want you to do, ribbit.” Tsuyu then tells you to...
112.title: Tsuyu Asui

choices: She makes you lick her other slimy foot.
Makes you clean out her slime filled socks with your mouth.
1121.content:
“I want you to massage my feet, ribbit. They have been cramped in my boots all day trying to find you. They’re all sweaty too. I think it’s a good enough punishment.” You sigh in relief. Massaging feet isn’t that bad. “Oh yeah and by the way, for us, I guess you could say ‘frog people, it’s a tradition to massage feet with our tongues, ribbit. So that’s what you’ll be doing. You’re going to massage my feet with your tongue.” What!? With your tongue!? That’s gross and disgusting! Especially when she says her feet have been sweaty all day!

You try to run to the door but Tsuyu catches you with her frog tongue again and brings you over to her. “Whoops. You almost ran away. Maybe the mind control thing the announcer talked about might be a little buggy. Don’t worry. I’ve got a hold of you, ribbit.” This is bad! You couldn’t go anywhere now! Tsuyu has you fully wrapped in her tongue! All you could do is watch as Tsuyu begin pull one of her frog boots off. She slowly pulled it all the way down from her leg, though it did get stuck once. That’s never a good sign!

With her boot off you could now see her black thigh length sock. It was literally soaked in sweat! So much that you could see her whole leg glistening! Tsuyu then pulled her other boot off and revealed her other sweat glistened sock. They made squishy noises when she moved! Never a good sound! She then began to peel her left sock off. When she started to peel it off you saw strings of sweat still connecting from her unpeeled sock part and her leg, like it wasn’t even sweat at all! Like some sort of sticky, slimy substance! Is that not sweat!?

As Tsuyu continued to pull her sock more slimy strings were formed, and some of previous ones were still stretching out! “Ugh. These are always such a hassle to peel off, ribbit.” She peeled it off to reveal her long bare foot with green colored toenails. You couldn’t believe what you were seeing! Her foot was way larger than your average foot size, like she had actual human-frog feet. Sweat, or whatever it was, was dripping down the length of her foot! Droplets at the end of her heel made small strings lines before they fell off! This slimy substance made you feel queasy! Not to mention the awful smell! Her foot smelled like a swamp!

As you stared at her slimy foot, Tsuyu peeled her other sock off without you even noticing. Two long, bare, slimy feet now filled your vision. The awful smell increased. Finally, Tsuyu revealed what the substance was. “Oh yeah, I forgot to tell you. Our feet produce slimy frog sweat rather than regular sweat, ribbit. It’s a real pain for us when we have to take our shoes or socks off.” Frog foot sweat!? “That’s why we use our tongues to clean off all of the slime, ribbit. You don’t have a tongue as long as we do, but it will still suffice.” You wanted to do nothing more than to run away or to call for help! But Tsuyu’s tongue has you wrapped up tight and you weren’t allowed to speak unless commanded to!

“Let’s begin. Stick your tongue out as far as you can.” Without choice you dreadfully stuck your tongue out! Tsuyu then stretched out her left slime-covered foot. “Start with this one, ribbit.” Tsuyu then used her tongue to slowly inch your tongue towards her sole! You were filled with dread as the slimy sole came closer and closer! You wanted to struggle to to get out or put your tongue back in or anything that matter! But nothing happened. Your tongue was merely inches away from her sole. The smell intensified and you could see the slime more clearly! At little closer... and then it happened. Your tongue was fully flat on her arch and you began to lick up.

You gagged and retched! The taste was indescribably terrible! Your tongue collected gallons of slime sweat! It tasted strongly sour and salty as it stuck to your tongue! Your face froze in cringe as you slowly licked up and down the length of her awful foot! Slime stuck to your face and went down your throat! You wanted to throw up but you couldn’t! Instead you just kept running your tongue all over her foot! “Don’t stop until my foot is clean of slime, ribbit.” You wanted to cry! Her foot was so big and slimy was so hard to clean off! You knew this meant hours of foot licking!

And you were right. Hours of foot licking it was! But slime just continued to pour over her sole! “I see the problem, ribbit. My slime keep forming from in between my toes. So that’s where your going to clean next. Lick in between my toes.” Your heart stopped. She moved her toes right in front of your face. You can see big globs of slime in between her toes oozing down her length! It was so haunting to look at! You gulped as your tongue slowly proceeded toward her first and second toe! Goodbye cruel world. Your tongue enters her first crevice.

Words couldn’t describe how horrible this is! Literally huge globs of frog foot slime invaded your tastebuds! It tasted so much nastier in between her toes! It was warmer and fresh from her toes! Globs of slime slid down your tongue and into your mouth in the process as you continued to lick! And the horrible rank smell! Your eyes couldn’t stop forming tears! The foot slime forms so fast. As you licked it all out more slime was quickly produced. You had to keep licking until all of the slime was cleared from her toe crevice! Needless to say, this made the process way more awful!

Thanks to this the cleaning took longer than it needed to be, and you had to lick up more foot slime! At some point your mouth was filled with horrible foot slime and you had no choice but to swallow it all down! Your body almost threw up on its own! Of all the terrible things that you had to go through, swallowing a gallon of down was the worst! Not only that but you had to repeat this process more than once! There were still more crevices to lick clean of, and you cleaned every...last...one, swallowing a gallon of slime from time to time. You didn’t stop crying throughout the entire process.

After you were finally done cleaning out her toe crevices Tsuyu gave you another command. “Nicely done, ribbit. That took longer than I expected, about more than 30 minutes.” Good to know. “Now that my foot slime has finally stopped forming you can lick clean my feet again, ribbit.” Not only you had the worst experience of your life but you had to start the process all over again. You hate your life. You licked her entire slimy awful foot again. A painful process but not as nearly as bad as between her toes!

Finally! You were finally done. The nightmare was over! You felt complete relief! “Great job. I haven’t seen my foot so clean in a long time. Now it’s time to clean the other one, ribbit.” And with that, your relief seized to exist. All that’s left is terror! Another foot covered in fresh foot slime awaited you! This couldn’t possibly get any worse!

Or could it?
1121.title: Lick her slimy feet clean.

114.content:
“Woohoo! I won!” You were caught! An announcement played. “Attention contestants. The game is now over. Mina Ashido has won the game. She will now get a special room to test her new slave and the rest of you will leave empty handed. That is all.” The announcement ended.

You felt dread! You were now a slave to this girl now! She had pink skin and pink hair. She wore a white mask and had black eyes with yellow pupils. She had a purple and turquoise skin tight body suit and purple boots. Her personality was cheerful and laid back. “Yes! I’ve always wanted a personal slave! And a special room!? Bonus!” She said personal slave so cheerfully! “Come on slave! Onward to the special room!” Your body followed her command and walked along with her to the special room. Your body was under her control now!

You two arrived inside the special room. It was basically a very fancy and royal bedroom! “Ooooooh! Fan-cy! I hit the jackpot!” Mina then turned around to you. “And perfect timing to have a slave! So here’s what’s up. My body is so tired an sweaty from trying to find you, especially my feet! They’re sweating like mad! And in case you didn’t know already, my quirk is Acid! And my acid quirk makes my feet even more hot and sweaty!” Just hearing this made you sick to your stomach!

“So here’s your first job as my new personal slave!” Mins then tells you to...
114.title: Mina Ashido

choices: “Let’s go home to and do fun stuff there!”
1141.content:
“I want you to lick my feet clean for me! That’ll cool off my feet just fine!” You panicked! She wanted you to LICK her feet clean! And after she just told you how grossly they were! “So let’s get started! Come over here slave!” Your body, not having a choice, followed her command and you went and sat down on the floor right in front of her. You can slightly smell how vile her feet were even with her boots on! Her boots looked torn and worn out. Not a good sign! Mina gave you a mischievous grin. “Now this is where the fun begins!” You didn’t like any of this!

Mina began trying to pull off one of her boots. She had a difficult time doing so though. “Uggh! Come on!” You could hear squeaking coming from inside her boot! It made you dread more! Finally she slipped it right off and an intoxicating aroma started to torture you! Your face cringed up! All the stench that was trapped in there was now free and violating your nose! Mina fanned her hand playfully. “Phew! God that stinks! Haha!” You saw her sock Claude’s foot. It was the same color as her body suit. It was foul, moldy, rotten, soggy, and completely worn out! It looked so unpleasant! The stench was even worse now! While you were looking at how bad her sock was Mina slipped off her other boot. Both terribly looking socks were now shown and the smell doubled! “Time to peel off these old things now!”

Mina began to slowly peel off one of her socks, making a sticky noise as she did! A couple of sweat droplets fell to the ground in front of you and burned through the ground! You were terrified now! Mina fully peeled off her sock, revealing her bare pink foot. Her foot was sweating like mad with more sweat droplets fallen down and burning through the ground! Her toenails were painted hot pink. The smell made you form tears in your eyes! It was so rancid! “I’m surprised this sock didn’t melt off! Sweet! Wow my foot is sweating! It’s time for you to shine slave! Start taking long licks up my foot!” This is a nightmare! You urge and plead your body to not do this, but to no avail! Your face slowly made its way closer to her foot, sweat contantly dripping down from it! Your tongue slowly stuck out, and then you were thrown into your own personal hell. You slowly ran your tongue up her heel.

Instantly you were screaming in your mind! You made noises of disgust! Your tongue was burning! It tasted so stale and salty! Her acid foot sweat burned your tongue as you licked! You wanted to do nothing but to take your tongue off her foot, but your body kept slowly licking up her foot! Mina laughed. “Hahahaha! That tickles so much!” Can’t she see that your in complete hell right now!? Her acid foot sweat kept burning your tongue! You felt like your tongue was going to melt off! It burned so much! You couldn’t help but she’d some tears! Not to mention it tasted horribly awful! Does this girl ever wash her feet!? Your nose was assaulted by the stench up close! It couldn’t handle the horrible smell! You felt like your nose hairs were going to burn off along with your tongue! All of this happened and you were still licking up her heel! In reality, it has only been a few seconds, but it seemed longer than that to you! Why do you have to lick so slow!?

You then began to slowly lick up her arch. It tasted even worse than her heel and you didn’t know why! Your tongue was moving at the pace of a snail! Her foot tasted salty, acrid, stale, tangy, and downright disgusting along with a powerful burning sensation that the acid sweat was giving to your tongue! Surprisingly your tongue didn’t burn off, but now you wish it did! As you slowly licked, Mina constantly giggled and was peeling her other sock off. She peeled it off and both her feet were now bare and sweating like hell! “And when your done licking clean that foot, this foot will be waiting for you!” You were in complete misery. You licked up her forefoot, which was also extremely awful, and then you licked up her toes, which tasted the worst! Your head then went back to the bottom of her heel and you began to start the process all over!

“This is taking too long! When I told you to lick slow I didn’t mean that slow! Speed it up a little!” You began to lick up her foot a little faster now! You didn’t do 30 seconds of licking up her foot this time, but now you tasted more of her revolting acid foot now, tasting more burning salty sweat! Even with the process sped up, her foot was still sweating like mad! You were pleading in your mind that this wasn’t a never ending process! After about a whole hour (yes a Whole Hour!) of just constantly licking her sweaty acid foot, her foot finally looked liked it was almost completely clean of sweat! Mina fell asleep at some point and woke up! “Mmnngh. What? Oh! Hey nice job! My foot looks like it’s finally stopped sweating! Wait a minute. My toes are still really sweaty! I think it’s time to suck these bad boys! Suck all the sweat off of each toe!”

Mina wiggled her sweaty toes playfully at you. You were once again filled with dread! Her toes were the worst yet and now you have to suck all the sweat off of them! Regardless your mouth still went to her awful toes anyways! The closer your face went to her toes, the more sweaty and rancid they looked! Your mouth made a pucker face, went to her big toe, and sucked on it. Your mind screamed of how awful her big toe tasted! So much salty and burning acid sweat was being sucked down into your poor throat as you sucked! It seemed like there was an unlimited amount of sweat! You shedded more tears! Mina just giggled and wiggled her big toe in your mouth. Once you were done sucking all the sweat off her big toe (there was a lot! It took like 5 minutes!) you proceeded to suck the rest of her toes, unwillingly of course.

Each toe never tasted any better! They were all terribly bad! But you finally finished sucking them clean! You felt joy until Mina ruined it. “Oh yeah! I forgot! My toe jam duh!” Your heart sank after you heard her say toe jam! “That’s the main reason why my feet sweat so bad! Slavy, clean out all of the toe jam from between my toes please!” You were in hell! You looked between her toes. Her toe jam was the most acid-like substance you’ve seen so far as it made heat waves from between each toe! It looked horrible! You never thought something would look so revolting! Once again pleading your body to not go through with this, you stuck out your tongue and started to clean out the jam in between her first and second toe!

This made you want to instantly throw up! You could’ve called it plain acid instead of toe jam if it didn’t kill your tastebuds with the vile taste! Your tongue burned like never before as you licked it all out! You then went to her second crevice and proceeded to lick it out. The jam slowly melted on your tongue leaving a burning sensation as you cleaned it all out! You screamed in your head of how horrible this was! When you finished cleaning the rest out you thought you saw heaven but then...”Nice job! Now you only have one more foot to clean!” You saw her other foot, fresh and sweating like mad as she wiggled her toes with more visible toe jam! You were lost for words! As you finished one nightmare, another begins!

Another hour of burning, disgust, and feet! But finally it was over! “Woooooo! You did it!” It was hard to imagine but this was the end! Your tastebuds felt like they were melted together! “Finally we can move on to more feet related fun stuff!” You knew it was too good to be true! More nightmares! “Now what should we do next?”
1141.title: Lick her sweat soaked acid feet.

info.brief_description: The girls form My Hero Academia have you as their slave, and at their feet!
info.description:
Write chapters about My Hero Academia girls having you as their footslave!

Ex: smelling, licking, sucking, worship, trampling, bondage, domination, etc.

Have the main character 1st person (I, my) or 2nd person (you, your).

No getting turned on or liking feet! The main character must hate it!

Sweaty, dirty, smelly, nasty things are allowed!

Have the girls have their own personality. You make them a little sadistic!

Make each chapter long and good!

For author created chapters:
2500 points= 1 chapter
5000 points= 2 chapters

Be creative and have fun!
